meanings.sent1: The car progressed slowly down the road.
meanings.sent2: The students progressed through the chapters of the book.
meanings.sent3: The turtle progressed at a snail's pace in the race.
meanings.sent4: As time progressed, technology advanced rapidly.
meanings.sent5: The river progressed steadily towards the ocean.

meanings.sent1: The progressed project received positive feedback.
meanings.sent2: Her skills have progressed significantly over time.
meanings.sent3: The cake was so delicious, it progressed to perfection.
meanings.sent4: The garden progressed into a beautiful oasis.
meanings.sent5: The painting progressed into a masterpiece with each stroke.

meanings.definition: Made progress or moved towards a goal
meanings.sent1: She progressed towards her dream of becoming a doctor.
meanings.sent2: The team progressed closer to winning the championship.
meanings.sent3: The cat progressed stealthily towards the mouse.
meanings.sent4: His career progressed steadily towards success.
meanings.sent5: The rocket progressed swiftly towards outer space.
